name: AttachmentStatus
title: Attachment Status
description: Attachment Status codes for insurance operations.

concept.definition: Attachment status not covered by other specific codes.
The document is included with the current submission.

concept.display: Agent/Broker is retaining a Copy on File
concept.definition: The document is held by the agent or broker and available upon request but is not being transmitted.

designation.value: Le courtier conserve une copie au dossier
El corredor conserva una copia en archivo

concept.display: Agent/Broker is Sending a Copy via Mail/Courier
concept.definition: A physical copy of the document is being sent through postal or courier services.

designation.value: Le courtier envoie une copie par la poste/messager
El corredor envía una copia por correo/mensajería

concept.display: Document Not Available Yet / Will be Forwarded Upon Receipt
concept.definition: The document is not currently available but will be transmitted once obtained.

designation.value: Document pas encore disponible / sera envoyé dès que reçu
Documento aún no disponible / se enviará al recibirlo

concept.display: Document Not Available Yet / Will be Kept in Files Upon Receipt
concept.definition: The document is not currently available but will be retained in files once obtained.

designation.value: Document pas encore disponible / sera conservé au dossier dès que reçu
Documento aún no disponible / se conservará en archivo al recibirlo

concept.definition: The document exists in digital format.
The document is not relevant or required for this submission.
The document was submitted in a prior transaction and does not need to be resubmitted.
